events.name: Thursday 30th July
events.description: Our goal is to make the Ruby on Rails community in Singapore more inclusive for women and other minorities - so if you know anyone that codes or that you think would enjoy learning to code, invite them along!

events.name: Windows 10 Community Launch
events.description: RSVP Here: http://bit.ly/SWUGWin10Launch Windows 10 launch is just around the corner, in less 10 days if you’re counting. On July 29, Microsoft will make Windows 10 available, across 190 countries. The community leaders across various Singapore User Group are arranging for a Windows 10 Community Launch. In this launch, you will get to know what's new in Windows 10 and the things that matters to you most as an IT Professional and Developers. You are invited to join us for this new "Windows Update" and also meet up with the Singapore's MVPs. Please RSVP to help us with the logistic arrangement. Note: No confirmation email will be sent out upon registration. Just turn up on the actual day. Date : July 30, Thursday Time : 7.00pm - 10.00pm (Registration starts at 6.30pm) Venue : 1 Marina Boulevard, One Marina Boulevard, #21-01 Singapore[masked]
events.location: Microsoft Singpaore, One Marina Boulevard, Level 21 Auditorum, Singapore 018989

events.name: Python Meetup + PyCon SG 2016 Committee - July 2015
events.description: Hey everyone, we will be having a user meetup at the end of this July. In addition, we are looking for volunteers to help us make PyCon SG 2016 a reality. Come join us this evening to meet with the Python community in Singapore and be involved in our next conference! Venue: Red Hat 8 Shenton Way, 10-01 AXA Tower, 068811 Singapore, Singapore Time: 7.30 - 9pm Agenda: - Martin Brochhaus: PyCon SG 2015 recap - Forming of PyCon SG 2016 Committee
events.location: Red Hat, 8 Shenton Way, 10-01 AXA Tower, 068811 Singapore

events.name: Amateur Radio July Meetup
events.description: Amateur Radio, or Ham Radio, is a hobby with activities involving communication via radio waves. Most enthusiasts are fascinated with operating radio transmitters, receivers and antennas or how radio waves are able to get from one corner of the earth to another.
events.location: Alumni Medical Centre, No.2 College Road, Singapore 169850

events.name: Windows 10 Game Development
events.description: We are merging a Windows Launch event with this. Updated Agenda Please Register Here http://bit.ly/SWUGWin10Launch 6.30pm - Registration 7.00pm - What's new in Windows 10 (Auditorium) 8.00pm - Break and break out 8.30pm - ITP @ Auditorium (OR) Windows 10 Game Development @ 22CF12 9.30pm - Either Go home or gather at Auditorium for closing Guest Speaker Uditha Bandara will be flying from Srilanka to Singapore to speak in this Meetup. He is the first Xbox MVP in South East Asia. About Speaker: Uditha Bandara is specializes in .NET Game development for Windows Phone, Xbox and PC. He was the South East Asia’s First XNA/DirectX MVP (Most Valuable Professional). He had delivered sessions at various events and conferences in Singapore, Hong Kong,Malaysia Sri Lanka and India. He has published several articles,books, tutorials, and game demos on his XNA Game Development Blog – http://uditha.wordpress.com
events.location: Microsoft Singapore, One Marina Boulevard, Level 22, Meeting Room
